title: Music at Festival Acadiens
text:
This weekend’s event includes Festival de Musique, a showcase of the best Cajun and Zydeco music on six different stages inside Girard Park. Here is the schedule of acts performing on all six stages over the three-day period: Scène Ma Louisiane 
Friday, Oct. 9 5:30 p.m.-6:45 p.m.: Acadian Connection featuring Terry Huval and Jambalaya, D.L. Menard, Hert LeBlanc, Jo-El Sonnier, Christine Balfa, Kevin Wimmer and Waylon Thibodeaux More On This Topic 7:15 p.m.-8:45 p.m.: Geno Delafose and French Rockin Boogie Saturday, Oct. 10 10:30 a.m.-11:30 a.m.: Rachel Wilson and Cajun Express 11:45 a.m.- 12:45 p.m.: T-Salé, with tribute to Cyp and Adam Landreneau 1 p.m.-2:15 p.m.: Jeffrey Broussard and the Creole Cowboys and Family Juré 2:30 p.m.-3:30 p.m.: Kevin Naquin and the Ossun Playboys 3:45 p.m.-4:45 p.m.: Horace Trahan and the Ossun Express 5 p.m.-6 p.m.: Roddie Romero and the Hub City All Stars 6:15 p.m.-7:30 p.m.: Bonsoir, Catin Sunday, Oct. 11 10:30 a.m.-11:30 a.m.: Robert Jardell and Pure Cajun 11:45 a.m.-12:45 p.m.: Dog Hill Stompers 1 p.m.-2 p.m.: Hert LeBlanc Band 2:15 p.m.-3:15 p.m.: Travis Matte and the Kingpins 3:30 p.m.-4:30 p.m.: Richard LeBoeuf and Two-Step 4:45 p.m.-5:45 p.m.: Jo-El Sonnier 6 p.m.-7:15 p.m.: Wayne Toups and ZydeCajun Scène Mon Héritage 10:45 a.m.-11:45 a.m.: Sheryl Cormier and Cajun Sound Noon-1 p.m.: Ruben Moreno and Zydeco Re-Evolution 1:15 p.m.- 2:15 p.m.: Magnolia Sisters 2:30 p.m.-3:30 p.m.: Pine Leaf Boys 3:45 p.m.-4:45 p.m.: Corey Ledet Zydeco Band 5 p.m.- 6:30 p.m.: Feufollet Sunday, Oct. 11 10:30 a.m.-11:30 a.m.: Lil Wayne and Same Old Two-Step 11:45 a.m.-12:45 p.m.: Babineaux Sisters 1 p.m.-2 p.m.: Chubby Carrier and the Bayou Swamp Band 2:15 p.m.-3:15 p.m.: Lost Bayou Ramblers 3:30 p.m.-4:45 p.m.: Terry and the Zydeco Bay Boys 5 p.m.-6:30 p.m.: Steve Riley and the Mamou Playboys Salle de Danse 11 a.m.-Noon: Lafayette Rhythm Devils 12:15 p.m.-1:15 p.m.: Zydeco Radio 1:30 p.m.-2:30 p.m.: Sweet Crude 2:45 p.m.-4 p.m.: Creole String Beans 4:15 p.m.-5:30 p.m.: Savoy Family Band Sunday, Oct. 11 9 a.m.-10 a.m.: French Mass 11 a.m.-Noon: Paul Daigle & Cajun Gold 12:15 p.m.-1:15 p.m.: Keith Frank & the Soileau Zydeco Band 1:30 p.m.-2:30 p.m.: Red Beans and Rice Revue Reunion 2:45 p.m.-3:45 p.m.: The Revelers 4 p.m.-5:30 p.m.: Gregg Martinez and the Delta Kings Atelier and Jam Tent 11:30 a.m.-12:30 p.m.: Is it ladylike? Christine Balfa, Sheryl Cormier, Mary Broussard, Kristi Guillory 12:45 p.m.-1:45 p.m.: Acadian Ballads — David Greely, Barry Ancelet, Megan Brown and Hert LeBlanc 2 p.m.-3 p.m.: Pianorama — Rick Lagneaux, Wilson Savoy and Eric Adcock 3:15 p.m.-4:15 p.m.: Electric Guitars — Sam Broussard, Chris Stafford and Tommy Shreve 4:30 p.m.-5:30 p.m.: Louisiana Creole French Songs — Bruce “Sunpie” Barnes, Leroy Etienne and Aurelien Barnes Sunday, Oct. 11 11:30 a.m.-12:30 p.m.: Master Fiddlers — Kevin Wimmer and Mitch Reed 12:45 p.m.- 1:45 p.m.: Steel Guitars in Cajun Dance Halls — Randall Foreman, Richard Comeaux and Marty Broussard 2 p.m.-3 p.m.: Fiddlers with amps — Jamie Bearb, Jason Bergeron and Travis Matte 3:15 p.m.- 4:15 p.m.: Accordion theory — Jason Frey, Steve Riley and Dexter Ardoin 4:30 p.m.- 5:30 p.m.: Sweet Cecilia Anniversary Stage 11:30 a.m.-12:30 p.m.: Huval-Fuselier Cajun Trio 12:45 p.m.-1:45 p.m.: Ervin Frey and the Eunice Ramblers 2 p.m.-3 p.m.: Kira Viator and Bayou Beat 3:15 p.m.-4:15 p.m.: Cameron Dupuy and the Cajun Troubadours 4:30 p.m.-5:30 p.m.: Ray Abshire and Friends Sunday, Oct. 11 11:30 a.m.-12:30 p.m.: Dexter Ardoin Band 12:45 p.m.-1:45 p.m.: T’Monde 2 p.m.-3 p.m.: Courtbouillon 3:15 p.m.-4:15 p.m.: Jimmy Breaux and friends 4:30 p.m.-5:30 p.m.: Goldman Thibodeaux and friends Jam Ça!
